Joseph Alan “JAC” Carper II

August 15, 2024

Joseph Alan “JAC” Carper II, 4, of Altoona, passed away unexpectedly Monday evening in Altoona. JAC was non-verbal and diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder; therefore he struggled with elopement, which resulted in an accidental drowning. He was born in Altoona, the son of Joseph Alan and ...

Russell D. ‘Russ’ Grager

August 15, 2024

Russell D. “Russ” Grager, 51, of Altoona, passed away Sunday at UPMC Altoona Hospital after a courageous battle with cancer. He was born in Altoona, a son of Elmer D. and Andora (Fleck) Grager. On Aug. 8, 2020, Russ was united in marriage to the love of his life, Amy (Branter) Grager. Amy ...

Gloria L. Guyer

August 15, 2024

Gloria L. Guyer, 69, of rural New Enterprise, died Tuesday. She was born in Roaring Spring, daughter of the late Elwood R. Smith and Mary L. (McConahy) Baker. Surviving are her husband of 52 years, Dan; sons, Mark (Debra) and Matthew (Stephanie Brumbaugh); several grandchildren; siblings: Jane ...

Judith Ann Hamilton

August 15, 2024
